name: Team Aqua’s Walrein
author: Hitoshi Ariga
flavor_text: It’s good at attacks that freeze opponents with a powerful cold snap. Then, it pulverizes a frozen foe with its sharp tusks!

attacks.name: Power Blow
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dual Blizzard
attacks.effect: Discard 2 {W} Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
